name: Deer Hunting Adventure 2017
description:
Let’s go for Safari Sniper Deer Hunting Adventure on 4x4 super duty truck 2017. Hunting Deer is an addictive and amazing action packed game to take target shooting experience adventure in the most safari jungle environment. Those who loves professional first person modern sniper Gazelle hunts & loves action pack shooting games, Deer Hunting Adventure 2017 is truely for you. Make a plan to become a pro stag hunter in a limited time by downloading this deer hunting game and become a champion after making a prey deer in America, Africa & Australia.

Do have trust on your hunter & shooter skills by taking sniper. Let's go for safari 4x4 hunting on big super duty truck. You can enjoy three top forest & sceneries like mountains, grass, wildlife, wilderness. In this game three types of animals included like Doe Deer, Gazelle, Stag. Safari Deer Target Hunting Adventure gives you a fully unique game-play in which you can hunt wild Gazelle animals on Big truck.Wild Animal Hunter lets hunt most beautiful stag in the world with modern army sniper gun. Travel from America to Africa & africa to Australia to enjoy huntings on 4x4 jeep truck. Experience the target stag hunt as a professional hunter.

>>> GAME TOP FEATURES <<<

~ First Person Sniper Shooter
~ Hunting in most Famous forests of world
~ Most attractive and free target shooting experience
~ Hunting on 4x4 super duty truck
~ Action Packed Camera Slow Mo Bullet Effect
~ Extra Time Reward if you fail to complete your hunt in a given time
~ Dont let stag go Game Fails
~ Stunning & HD graphics
~ Super Duper Forests
~ Enjoy Hunting like a huntsman professional
